EmailTemplate.description: Notification e-mail to the contact plan owner 1 week in advance before expected date.
EmailTemplate.name: Notification e-mail to the contact plan owner 1 week in advance
EmailTemplate.subject: You have a scheduled visit ContactPlan {!Contact_Plan__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
The business case approval workflow item {!WorkFlow_Approval_History__c.WorkFlow_Id__c} {!WorkFlow_Approval_History__c.Customer_Name__c} {!WorkFlow_Approval_History__c.Opportunity_Description__c} has been approved by {!WorkFlow_Approval_History__c.Approver__c} with the following comment: {!WorkFlow_Approval_History__c.Comments__c}.
Please {!WorkFlow_Approval_History__c.Click_Here__c} to view the details.
Thank You.
